verses.verse: Now the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H3254>again<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> so that the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> them into the <S%H3027>hands<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H8141>years.<s%>

And there was a <S%H259>certain<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H6881>Zorah,<s%> of the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H1839>Danites,<s%> whose <S%H8034>name<s%> was <S%H4495>Manoah;<s%> and his <S%H802>wife<s%> was <S%H6135>barren<s%> and had <S%H3205>borne<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> [children.]

Then the <S%H4397>angel<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H7200>appeared<s%> to the <S%H802>woman,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to her, <S%H2009>"Behold<s%> <S%H4994>now,<s%> you are <S%H6135>barren<s%> and have <S%H3205>borne<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> [children,] but you shall <S%H2029>conceive<s%> and <S%H3205>give<s%> <S%H3205>birth<s%> to a <S%H1121>son.<s%>

<S%H6258>"Now<s%> therefore, be <S%H8104>careful<s%> not to <S%H8354>drink<s%> <S%H3196>wine<s%> or <S%H7941>strong<s%> <S%H7941>drink,<s%> <S%H408>nor<s%> <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H2931>unclean<s%> <S%H2931>thing.<s%>

"For <S%H2009>behold,<s%> you shall <S%H2030>conceive<s%> and <S%H3205>give<s%> <S%H3205>birth<s%> to a <S%H1121>son,<s%> and <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H4177>razor<s%> shall <S%H5927>come<s%> upon his <S%H7218>head,<s%> for the <S%H5288>boy<s%> shall be a <S%H5139>Nazirite<s%> to <S%H430>God<s%> from the <S%H990>womb;<s%> and he shall <S%H2490>begin<s%> to <S%H3467>deliver<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> from the <S%H3027>hands<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines.<s%>"

Then the <S%H802>woman<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> and <S%H559>told<s%> her <S%H376>husband,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> "A <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to me and his <S%H4758>appearance<s%> was like the <S%H4758>appearance<s%> of the <S%H4397>angel<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H3372>awesome.<s%> And I did not <S%H7592>ask<s%> him <S%H335>where<s%> he [came] from, <S%H3808>nor<s%> did he <S%H5046>tell<s%> me his <S%H8034>name.<s%>

"But he <S%H559>said<s%> to me, <S%H2009>'Behold,<s%> you shall <S%H2030>conceive<s%> and <S%H3205>give<s%> <S%H3205>birth<s%> to a <S%H1121>son,<s%> and <S%H6258>now<s%> you shall not <S%H8354>drink<s%> <S%H3196>wine<s%> or <S%H7941>strong<s%> <S%H7941>drink<s%> <S%H408>nor<s%> <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H2932>unclean<s%> <S%H2932>thing,<s%> for the <S%H5288>boy<s%> shall be a <S%H5139>Nazirite<s%> to <S%H430>God<s%> from the <S%H990>womb<s%> to the <S%H3117>day<s%> of his <S%H4194>death.<s%>'"

Then <S%H4495>Manoah<s%> <S%H6279>entreated<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H994>"O<s%> <S%H136>Lord,<s%> <S%H994>please<s%> <S%H4994><s%> let the <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> Thou hast <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H935>come<s%> to us <S%H5750>again<s%> that he may <S%H3384>teach<s%> us <S%H4100>what<s%> to <S%H6213>do<s%> for the <S%H5288>boy<s%> who is to be <S%H3205>born.<s%>"

And <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H8085>listened<s%> to the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of <S%H4495>Manoah;<s%> and the <S%H4397>angel<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H5750>again<s%> to the <S%H802>woman<s%> as she was <S%H3427>sitting<s%> in the <S%H7704>field,<s%> but <S%H4495>Manoah<s%> her <S%H376>husband<s%> was not with her.

So the <S%H802>woman<s%> <S%H7323>ran<s%> <S%H4116>quickly<s%> and <S%H5046>told<s%> her <S%H376>husband,<s%> <S%H2009>"Behold,<s%> the <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> the [other] <S%H3117>day<s%> has <S%H7200>appeared<s%> to me."

Then <S%H4495>Manoah<s%> <S%H6965>arose<s%> and <S%H1980>followed<s%> <S%H310><s%> his <S%H802>wife,<s%> and when he <S%H935>came<s%> to the <S%H376>man<s%> he <S%H559>said<s%> to him, "Are you the <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to the <S%H802>woman<s%>?" And he <S%H559>said,<s%> "I am."

And <S%H4495>Manoah<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H6258>"Now<s%> when your <S%H1697>words<s%> <S%H935>come<s%> [to pass,] <S%H4100>what<s%> shall be the boy's <S%H4941>mode<s%> of <S%H4941>life<s%> and his <S%H4639>vocation<s%>?"

So the <S%H4397>angel<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H4495>Manoah,<s%> "Let the <S%H802>woman<s%> <S%H8104>pay<s%> <S%H8104>attention<s%> to <S%H3605>all<s%> that I <S%H559>said.<s%>

"She should not <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H3605>anything<s%> that <S%H3318>comes<s%> from the <S%H1612>vine<s%> <S%H408>nor<s%> <S%H8354>drink<s%> <S%H3196>wine<s%> or <S%H7941>strong<s%> <S%H7941>drink,<s%> <S%H408>nor<s%> <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H2932>unclean<s%> <S%H2932>thing;<s%> let her <S%H8104>observe<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> that I <S%H6680>commanded.<s%>"

Then <S%H4495>Manoah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H4397>angel<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> <S%H4994>"Please<s%> let us <S%H6113>detain<s%> you so that we may <S%H6213>prepare<s%> a <S%H1423>kid<s%> <S%H5795><s%> for you."

And the <S%H4397>angel<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H4495>Manoah,<s%> <S%H518>"Though<s%> you <S%H6113>detain<s%> me, I will not <S%H398>eat<s%> your <S%H3899>food,<s%> but <S%H518>if<s%> you <S%H6213>prepare<s%> a <S%H5930>burnt<s%> <S%H5930>offering,<s%> [then] <S%H5927>offer<s%> it to the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>" For <S%H4495>Manoah<s%> did not <S%H3045>know<s%> that he was the <S%H4397>angel<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>

And <S%H4495>Manoah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H4397>angel<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> <S%H4310>"What<s%> is your <S%H8034>name,<s%> so that when your <S%H1697>words<s%> <S%H935>come<s%> [to pass,] we may <S%H3513>honor<s%> you?"
But the <S%H4397>angel<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to him, <S%H4100>"Why<s%> do you <S%H7592>ask<s%> my <S%H8034>name,<s%> seeing it is <S%H6383>wonderful<s%>?"

So <S%H4495>Manoah<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> the <S%H1423>kid<s%> <S%H5795><s%> with the grain <S%H4503>offering<s%> and <S%H5927>offered<s%> it on the <S%H6697>rock<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> and He <S%H6213>performed<s%> <S%H6381>wonders<s%> while <S%H4495>Manoah<s%> and his <S%H802>wife<s%> <S%H7200>looked<s%> on.

For it <S%H1961>came<s%> about when the <S%H3851>flame<s%> <S%H5927>went<s%> up from the <S%H4196>altar<s%> toward <S%H8064>heaven,<s%> that the <S%H4397>angel<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H5927>ascended<s%> in the <S%H3851>flame<s%> of the <S%H4196>altar.<s%> When <S%H4495>Manoah<s%> and his <S%H802>wife<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> [this,] they <S%H5307>fell<s%> on their <S%H6440>faces<s%> to the <S%H776>ground.<s%>

Now the <S%H4397>angel<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H7200>appeared<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H3254>more<s%> <S%H5750><s%> to <S%H4495>Manoah<s%> or his <S%H802>wife.<s%> <S%H227>Then<s%> <S%H4495>Manoah<s%> <S%H3045>knew<s%> that he was the <S%H4397>angel<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>
So <S%H4495>Manoah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to his <S%H802>wife,<s%> "We shall <S%H4191>surely<s%> <S%H4191>die,<s%> for we have <S%H7200>seen<s%> <S%H430>God.<s%>"

But his <S%H802>wife<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to him, <S%H3863>"If<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> had <S%H2654>desired<s%> to <S%H4191>kill<s%> us, He would not have <S%H3947>accepted<s%> a <S%H5930>burnt<s%> <S%H5930>offering<s%> and a grain <S%H4503>offering<s%> from our <S%H3027>hands,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> would He have <S%H7200>shown<s%> us <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H428>things,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> would He have let us <S%H8085>hear<s%> [things] like <S%H2088>this<s%> at this <S%H6256>time.<s%>"

Then the <S%H802>woman<s%> <S%H3205>gave<s%> <S%H3205>birth<s%> to a <S%H1121>son<s%> and <S%H7121>named<s%> <S%H8034><s%> him <S%H8123>Samson;<s%> and the <S%H5288>child<s%> <S%H1431>grew<s%> up and the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1288>blessed<s%> him.
And the <S%H7307>Spirit<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H2490>began<s%> to <S%H6470>stir<s%> him in Mahaneh-dan, <S%H996>between<s%> <S%H6881>Zorah<s%> and <S%H847>Eshtaol.<s%>
